news.title: Minister for Culture congratulates Irish theatre company for Edinburgh Fringe award
news.summary: "This is not just a brilliant achievement for all involved in this moving theatrical story but also an acknowledgement of the strength of Irish work," O'Donovan said.

news.title: Oasis dominate Irish Albums Chart this week ahead of Croke Park gigs
news.summary: Oasis also topped the charts when their Live '25 reunion tour officially began in early July.

news.title: Megadeth announce final album and tour
news.summary: “Don’t be mad, don’t be sad, be happy for us all," said Dave Mustaine.

news.title: Dublin transforms into the Ultimate Oasis Fan Zone ahead of the gig weekend
news.summary: Dublin gets Oasis ready ahead of this weekends gigs on August 16 and 17

news.title: Review: MARS redefines opera with out-of-this-world production at the Abbey Theatre
news.summary: The opera took on everything from space colonisation to pro-natalism to hustle culture with grace and gusto. The opera received a five-minute-long standing ovation when the curtains dropped.

news.title: Noel Gallagher/Liam Gallagher x Adidas SPZL Pop-Up at The Complex (Photos)
Partners in genocide: Israel, the US, and the "spinelessness" of European and UK leaders
news.summary: Hot Press called the campaign of ultra-violence on which Israel had embarked 22 months ago. Yet governments in Europe and the UK are still waffling while the genocide is escalated by Israel.
